name: Elonboy69
description:
This is a test 2D platformer game. I've experimented a bit with lights on my own for the first time and briefly understood how to guide players to goals with level design. Nothing crazy, just as a proof of concept.

Three changes:

  • Added 2D lights rendering
  • Added global, point and freeform lights
  • Added new level

Credits:
Milos Scepanovic
